item.title: Underland
item.description: For to think in deep time can be a means not of escaping our troubled present, but rather of re-imagining it; countermanding its quick greeds and furies with older, slower stories of making and unmaking. Three different siren calls for me: geology, linguistics, and [[notes/deep time|deep time]].
